    • Uses of IMonitorSolution in solver.constraints.nary.nogood

      Classes in solver.constraints.nary.nogood that implement IMonitorSolution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NogoodStoreFromSolutions
      Avoid exploring same solutions (useful with restart on solution) Beware : - Must be posted as a constraint AND plugged as a monitor as well - Cannot be reified - Only works for integer variables This can be used to remove similar/symmetric solutions
